Comment 11: 
This issue also impacts on issue #5023 which was fixed by altering the direction of
sends/receives in the semaphore chan.

If the resolution of the broader issue is that a semaphore is effective when using sends
to a full buffered chan, then the wording of "Effective Go" changed in rev 1a329995118c
might want to be reverted lest it continue to be a source of confusion around this
matter; it pretty much rules out their use in this fashion - with an example that seems
very close to the case in net with CLs 13038043/13348045.

Effective Go may be an appropriate place to discuss this as well as or instead of the MM
(https://golang.org/cl/13038043#msg31).
